LanguageData.GS_Fairy_Roast.label: Fairy kebab
LanguageData.GS_Fairy_Roast.description: A sought after gourmet meal consisting of a skewer with perfectly roasted assorted vegetables sandwiching a delectable fried fairy. The taste has been described slightly differently from each individual that tried it, but they all seem to have a consistent theme of describing the flavor as a combination of honey barbequed meat and "sadistic satisfaction." Eating this also provides a hefty regeneration effect for the consumer.
